import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{Col,Row}from'reactstrap';// import DisplayCard from './DisplayCard';
import AnimatedDisplayCard from'./AnimatedDisplayCard';import{selectFeaturedCampsite}from'../campsites/campsitesSlice';import{selectFeaturedPromotion}from'../promotions/promotionsSlice';import{selectFeaturedPartner}from'../partners/partnersSlice';import Loading from'../../components/Loading';import Error from'../../components/Error';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DisplayList=function DisplayList(){var items=useSelector(function(state){return[selectFeaturedCampsite(state),selectFeaturedPromotion(state),selectFeaturedPartner(state)];});console.log('display items:',items);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:items.map(function(item,idx){var featuredItem=item.featuredItem,isLoading=item.isLoading,errMsg=item.errMsg;if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{},idx);}if(errMsg){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{errMsg:errMsg},idx);}return featuredItem&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:true,className:"m-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedDisplayCard,{item:featuredItem})},idx);})});};export default DisplayList;
